short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attest by Pluto unleashes the power of zero-knowledge cryptography, allowing users to prove their Web2 data privately.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attest by Pluto unleashes the power of zero-knowledge cryptography, allowing users to prove their Web2 data privately. Attest allows you to generate advanced mathematical proofs called zero-knowledge proofs. Those proofs can be used to privately and verifiably demonstrate that users have certain characteristics — like how many followers users have on a certain social media application — in a secure way. Application developers can verify these proofs and incorporate these characteristics into their own application’s flows. Your private data stays completely within your control — Attest does the rest.
